Added corrections by vascoosx:
-correct triangle calculations for lbp/gradient filters
-fixes in numBlock calculation
fixed yOffset calculation
corrected formula for calculating numBlocks
cancelAnimationFrame fix
added missing offset calculation in loop

correct triangle height calculations
previously the "y" offset was not being calculated so this was added. Also added interspace to avoid mixing border pixel values from surrounding patches.

rebuilt clmtrackr.js

+cleanup

Fixed better scoring of faces

-better scoring in general
-wait for  scoring before convergence
-changed scoring to SVC, cropped down face window, changed mean/variance
normalization and log preprocessing
-new scoring in models

in jsfeat

Test of adding bias in webgl shaders

Added switching of filtertypes

Added possibility to switch between Local Binary Patterns,
Sobel/Gradient, and raw filters. Also added possibility to blend or
cycle between the different types of filters in order to improve
precision. Note that this only works in WebGL mode. In pure js mode only
raw filters are possible.
